string.NoIntegrationsConfigured:
There is no {title} GitHub App associated with this workspace. You must first install the {title} GitHub App and grant it access to your repositories.

If you are installing it for a GitHub organization, you need to have the appropriate permissions, or you should ask your colleagues to install it.

If you plan like to switch use of integration to another {title} workspace, please uninstall it first.
string.PleaseAuthorizeAs: You need to authorize the {title} GitHub App to access your GitHub account.
string.PleaseConnectToProject: Please connect repository to project to start using integration
string.IssueConnectedActivityInfo: Connected to Issue #{number} inside {repoName}
string.PullRequestConnectedActivityInfo: Connected to Pull Request #{number} inside {repoName}
string.AuthenticatedWithGithubEmployee: Please merge or remove Github person
string.AuthenticatedWithGithubRequired: Please authorize Github application to act on behind you to perform actions
string.AutoClose: Processing complete, Tab will be auto-closed in {time} seconds.
string.RequestFailed: Request failed. Please close the tab and try again.
string.UnlinkMessage:
Disconnect repository {repositoryName} from {prjName}?

All synchronized issues/pull requests {total} will be not touched.

Would you like to continue?
string.SelectWorkspaceToInstallApp: Installation should be performed from Workspace integration settings.
string.SelectWorkspaceToInstallAppMsg: Please uninstall application and try again.
string.AuthenticationRevokedGithub: Re-authorization for {login} is required for the proper functioning of the GitHub App
string.UnlinkInstallation: Are you sure you want to uninstall the GitHub App? Synchronization will be disabled.
